content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's start the negotiation. What is the rental price you are offering for my apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 500 euros per month. This is a fair price for a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Magdeburg.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's a low price, Max. I think you should increase it. Remember, my apartment is in the city center and close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that, but 500 euros is a reasonable price for a student like me. Considering the average income of students, I believe this price is fair. I am smart and dependable, so I will take good care of your apartment. How about 480 euros?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 480 euros is too low. My apartment is not just any apartment. It's a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I can find a tenant who is willing to pay more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your concern, but in Germany, landlords cannot charge excessive prices. Considering the average rent in Magdeburg, 480 euros is a reasonable price. I am a student, so I am on a limited budget. How about 490 euros?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I must insist. My apartment is in high demand. I am sure I can find a tenant who is willing to pay more. 500 euros is the lowest I can accept.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but 500 euros is already a high price for a student like me. How about 495 euros? This is a fair price for both parties. I am a dependable and responsible tenant.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your offer, but 495 euros is too low for my apartment. It's a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I can find a tenant who is willing to pay more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but 500 euros is the highest I can afford. I am a responsible and dependable student. How about we agree on 500 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euro! Congratulations, Max. We have agreed on the rental price of 500 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
